sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function JobCard ({ id, title, location, deadline, contact, email, hasApplied, archived }) { const value = archived || hasApplied async function handleApply () { axios.post('http://localhost:3000/user/apply', { email: email, id: id }) window.location.reload() } return (

{title}

Id: {id}

Location: {location}

Deadline: {deadline}

Contact: {contact}

{!value && }
) } export default JobCard
